name: Professor Smith 2D
description:
My game is made in 2D pixel art style based on the movie "I'm Legend"! According to the story, the main character (professor) locks himself in a chemical laboratory and tries to survive among the huge crowds of zombies! And according to the plot of my game, scientists conducted experiments on artificially grown people in order to create the perfect super soldier. But the experiment did not go according to plan and the test subject mutated and escaped, infecting all people in his path. This incident started the zombie apocalypse! But in my game, the main character has the ability to buy firearms and more. There are 11 waves of zombies in the game, and on the last wave the player will meet with a strong boss. Try to survive and hold out until the morning!

Control:

A D - player movement

SPACE - jump

R - recharge

E - interaction with objects

LMB - attack

1 2 3 ... 8 (or mouse wheel) - switch weapons

[There are also secret cheat codes in the game]
